content:
The Twitter Files, Part 3

Deplatforming the President
Congrats Morocco!!
Twitter is both a social media company and a crime scene
Deplatforming the President (cont.)
The bots are in for a surprise tomorrow
Saruman … your staff is broken.
Twitter was Wormtongue to the World
Twitter is speeding up
Unsuspend accounts who doxxed my exact location in real-time
Twitter right now is
And soon, ladies & gentlemen, the coup de grâce
Great questions
Meanwhile, Twitter usage (by real humans) once again reaches all-time highs
So inspiring to see the newfound love of freedom of speech by the press
KABOOM
Spaces is back
Second launch today

The people have spoken.

Accounts who doxxed my location will have their suspension lifted now.
Twitter will start incorporating mute & block signals from Blue Verified (not Legacy Blue) as downvotes
Live launch video
Congrats to SpaceX Team on 3 perfect orbital launches within 36 hours!!!

True creation eventually becomes independent of its creator. Evolution takes the original product far from its origin, with an uncertain outcome.
– Dune, The Machine Crusade
Hallelujah!!
Follow The World Cup on Twitter!
At World Cup right now
Great goal by Argentina!
Merry Christmas & Good Cheer to All!

Much more to The Twitter Files: Covid Editon than this introductory thread.

Follow-up piece to come next week, featuring leading doctors & researchers from Harvard, Stanford & other institutions.
Some nights …

“Don’t be the clown on the clown car!”

Too late haha
Why is corporate journalism rushing to defend the state instead of the people?
I’m not brainwashed!!
Congratulations SpaceX Falcon team on 60 successful launches this year!!
They did it!
New Twitter policy is to follow the science, which necessarily includes reasoned questioning of the science
Significant backend server architecture changes rolled out. Twitter should feel faster.
New Twitter will strive to optimize unregretted user-minutes
Launch 61 of 2022. Congrats SpaceX!
(Chart by James Stephenson)
I hope that the people of Brazil are able to resolve matters peacefully
All four orbital launch pads fully loaded with rockets for the first time!
Some things that your party tells you are false and some things that the other party says are true
Starship launch attempt soon
Bookmark button moving to tweet details page, fixing image length crop & other minor bug fixes next week
virtue rises with the sun

Twitter will publish tweet recommendation code & make account/tweet status visible no later than next month.

Transparency builds trust.
I wonder what would have happened in 2009 if the Fed had raised rates instead of lowering them
deamplify means shadowban

Good assessment of our goal
https://therabbithole84.substack.com/p/trust-as-a-service-taas-a-vision…
Instagram makes people depressed & Twitter makes people angry. Which is better?
Falcon Heavy Ascends
And that’s how we will land on Mars
Kudos to the BBC for self-labelling its state affiliation

Trashing accounts that you hate will cause our algorithm to show you more of those accounts, as it is keying off of your interactions.

Basically saying if you love trashing *that* account, then you will probably also love trashing *this* account. Not actually wrong lol.
The Car Aquatic
Shame on @MSNBC for misleading the public!
An American group made false claims about Russian election interference to interfere with American elections
So then why do call yourself “The” Associated Press
Nothing conveys gravitas better than being called Mr. Tweet
I work all day, then go home & play work simulator
Another major improvement in timeline refresh speed just released – now 10X faster than a few months ago
Disingenuous response from Hamilton 68 regarding their fake claims of Russian interference

The “Hamilton 68” dashboard was a high level scam to falsely accuse Russian influence behind everything. Their entire opaque system was a fraud, and virtually every media outlet fell for it. Everyone from NYT to Mother Jones should post a correction: x.com/mtaibbi/status…
Ω
Just leaving the engine bay of Starship

Good meeting with @ThierryBreton regarding EU DSA. The goals of transparency, accountability & accuracy of information are aligned with ours.

@CommunityNotes will be transformational for the latter.
What the Tesla Giga Nevada factory will look like when finished.

Team turned off 1 engine just before start & 1 stopped itself, so 31 engines fired overall.

But still enough engines to reach orbit!
One day, Starship will take us to Mars
And making a day in the life videos
http://Starlink.com
This test is at ~50% throttle. Launch attempt next month will be at ~90%.
Some of the smartest people I know actively believe the press … amazing
Starship Super Heavy

Long day at Twitter HQ with eng team

Two significant problems mostly addressed:

1. Fanout service for Following feed was getting overloaded when I tweeted, resulting in up to 95% of my tweets not getting delivered at all. Following is now pulling from search (aka Earlybird).…
Don’t worry, just some of my   friends of mine stopping by …
Starship orbital launch attempt soon!
Halftime Show Super Bowl LVII
What are your top requests for Twitter features & bug fixes?
Surround your house with treadmills set to jogging speed to stop walking dead ur welcome
Use of free authentication apps for 2FA will remain free and are much more secure than SMS
More Twitter Files from Matt Taibbi
BingChatGPT reminds me of Lucky in Waiting for Godot

All things in moderation, 
especially content moderation
Worth reading
Say what you want about me, but I acquired the world’s largest non-profit for $44B lol

Nice work by Community Notes team! 

In general, Community Notes is a game changer for combating wrong information.

What do you call an infinite gear ratio?
All torque, no action.

You’re not gonna believe this, but we’re running a little late! 

Presentation starts in ~5 mins.

Twice as many people died in Japan last year as were born. Population freefall.

Rest of the world is trending to follow.

The ability of Twitter advertising to reach the most influential people in the world is often not fully appreciated.

While a few other social networks are technically bigger, Twitter is where the writers & leaders spend their time.
“I used to be in crypto, but now I got interested in AI"
Another launch
169 mT to orbit this year so far
Something should be done
We should defund the GEC
Aiming to roll out ability to reply to individual DMs, use any reaction emoji & encryption later this month
How to sabotage an organization …
